Sample Event This is a test event created by an Appcelerator Demo App. Photo Attached foo@yahoo.com Title This is the subject PDF Attached John Doe one, two, three Someone My Location My Location Unavailable Subscribe to Channels Unsubscribe from Channels Click on the button to display the events for the selected calendar This application demonstrates the cross-platform capabilities of the Appcelerator platform. The application supports iOS, Android, Windows Mobile, Blackberry, Tizen, and mobile web.
Open the menu to see various demonstrations; some demonstrations are also visible below. Create Sample Event View Events Select the calendar type Email Picture Generate New Chart Enter the Text to be Encrypted: ENCRYPTED TEXT Click to Encrypt Clear Text Print Press the below button to demonstrate how to use jsPDF in Titanium. If you are using Android you will need to run this on the device to view the PDF. Run PDF Sample Geolocation Coupons Welcome Appcelerator Enable Push Notifications This is my text to be encrypted. Home Map Camera & Photo Barcode Charts Calendar Encryption Push Notifications Remote HTML File Local HTML File Local PDF File Generate PDF File Mapping is the closest location.
